title: Bantam Wheat Kings blank Hawks
text:
Bantam Wheat Kings blank Hawks By: Uncredited 
Trent Miner shut the door for the Brandon Wheat Kings as they defeated the Winnipeg Hawks 2-0 in Winnipeg AAA Bantam Hockey League Division 1 play on Sunday. 
Dylan Halliday and Ty Thorpe scored for the Wheat Kings, who improved to 5-2-0 at Kinsmen Arena. 
On Saturday at the Enns Brothers Arena, the Winnipeg Monarchs scored three times in the third period to beat the Wheat Kings 4-1. Thorpe had the marker for Brandon.
